messages.content: What is the purpose of the Image Resize node in ComfyUI_essentials?
The Image Resize node is designed to scale images and includes a 'keep proportions' feature to maintain the aspect ratio.
Can the Image Crop node in ComfyUI_essentials crop to the center of an image?
Yes, the Image Crop node in ComfyUI_essentials includes an auto crop feature that allows cropping to the center of an image.
What does the Image Desaturate node do in ComfyUI_essentials?
The Image Desaturate node is used to remove or reduce the color from an image, effectively converting it to grayscale.
How can the Mask Blur node be used in ComfyUI_essentials?
The Mask Blur node is used to apply a blur effect to a mask in ComfyUI_essentials.
What does the Model Compile node do in ComfyUI_essentials?
The Model Compile node compiles the model with torch.compile to optimize model performance. It can take a few minutes to compile but generation is faster afterwards.
Is there a node to save masks in ComfyUI_essentials?
A Mask Save node is marked as TODO in the ComfyUI_essentials documentation, indicating it is planned but not yet implemented.
